Package com.mygdx.game.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CameraController
    Updates the Camera when the game board is moved
    Constants
    Hold constants used for Hanto Game
    CoordinatesToPixels
    Handles conversion between Hanto game coordinates and pixel coordinates, which can then be used for drawing actors in screen
    DragAndDrop
    Manages drag and drop operations through registered drag sources and drop targets.
    DragAndDrop.Payload
    The payload of a drag and drop operation.
    DragAndDrop.Source
    A target where a payload can be dragged from.
    DragAndDrop.Target
    A target where a payload can be dropped to.
    GameController  
    GameStateHandler
    Handles switching turns, generating valid piece placement coordinates, etc
    Pixels
